title.name: Title
title.message: Create a title by writing something clever.

paragraph.name: Paragraph
paragraph.message: Create a Paragraph by writing something interesting.
paragraph.placeholder: Lemon drops cookie gummi bears biscuit tiramisu. Lemon drops gummies toffee wafer. Pastry gummies cupcake brownie pastry cake chupa chups.

list.name: List
list.message: Create a List by writing each item on a new line

image.name: Image
image.message: Create an Image by copy and pasting a url.

link.name: Link
link.message: Create a Link by writing first the text of the link and second write the url of the link on the second (and new) line.

iframe.name: Iframe
iframe.message: Create an Iframe by copy & pasting a url.
